import sys

def play(piles):
  has_enough = lambda p, i: p>=i
  indices = range(1,len(piles)+1)
  player = 1
  while True:
    player = 1 - player
    curr_max = -1
    for i,p in enumerate(piles):
      if p>=i+1:
        curr_max = i
    if curr_max >=0:
      piles[curr_max] -= curr_max+1
    else:
      break
  winner = 1 - player
  if winner == 0:
    print "ALICE"
  else:
    print "BOB"

def main():
  n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
  for i in range(n):
    k = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    ipile = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    play(ipile)
  pass

main()
